name: Fallen (itch)
description:
Play as a fallen angel trying to escape the terrible clutches of Hell!

Battle different evil creatures such as Cannon Gargoyles, Laser Eyes & the evil version of your very self in this top down shooter. Collect the souls of your victims to charge your holy energy and empower auto attacks. Avoid fire, lasers and even more fire to keep your energy up, or it will get drained before you know it!
